reviewText: It was what I expected, except I didn't like that the discs were stacked on top of each other in one case.
My son is a big Thomas fan, and these classic videos are wonderful. He's a big fan!

I bought this dvd for a friend of mine because of her nephews birthday the little guy loves it, the dvd contains the 4 dvd disc in excellent conditions and they work perfectly the spanish dub is amazing.

Bought this collection from a brick and mortar store for my son.  We both watch the show everyday on TV but when we watched these DVDs we noticed that they are full screen cropped.  These newer episodes of this show are in wide screen so why would they produce full screen version DVDs.  To make it worst many of the scenes are not panned right.  While the shots look great in wide screen, many times the full screen crops shove characters to the side of the screen.  Other scenes you can tell they where done originally in wide screen but due to the full screen crop, feel overly zoomed in.
Did not care for any of theThomas & Friends
My grandson loves his movie, keeps him happy when riding in the car.
My great nephew loves Thomas and these were a birthday gift to him.  I am sure he will get hours of enjoyment.

Best price for the DVDs
I can't wait to watch them with my boy
Keeps my nephew busy for hours!
